messages.title: HOW DAVID CAMERON AND THE CONSERVATIVES ARE SECURING A BETTER FUTURE FOR YOU, YOUR FAMILY AND OUR COUNTRY
BUDGET 2015
messages.content: A BUDGET THAT WORKS FOR YOU

messages.title: STRONG LEADERSHIP. A CLEAR ECONOMIC PLAN. A BETTER, MORE SECURE FUTURE.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting income tax for 27 million people, increasing the tax-free personal allowance, and ensuring strong support for mental health.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: BACKING BUSINESSES TO CREATE A JOB FOR EVERYONE WHO WANTS ONE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Abolishing the annual tax return to simplify the system, cutting taxes for small businesses, and supporting apprenticeships.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: DELIVERING SECURITY AND CHOICE IN RETIREMENT
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increasing State Pension with the 'triple lock' and giving people freedom over their pension pots and tax.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A PLAN TO ELIMINATE THE DEFICIT AND START PAYING DOWN OUR DEBTS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Eliminating the deficit, running an overall surplus, and building a stronger economy to continue investing in public services like schools and the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: HELPING PEOPLE SAVE FOR THE FUTURE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introducing a New Personal Savings Allowance, a Help to Buy ISA, and adjusting the ISA limit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: GIVING EVERYONE A CHANCE TO HAVE A HOME OF THEIR OWN
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building 200,000 new Starter Homes exclusively for first-time buyers, and extending the Help to Buy scheme.

issues.economy: Our economy is growing, the UK will grow 2.5% this year, while economies around the world suffer weaker growth.

housing.content: Building 200,000 new Starter Homes exclusively for first-time buyers, and extending the Help to Buy scheme to give a 20% discount for first-time buyers under 40.

quotes.text: Employment is at a record high, 1.000 more jobs have been created every day since the Conservatives took office.
Our long-term economic plan is working but we need to keep working to secure a better future.

images.caption: Various images representing Conservatives' policies and their impacts on families, businesses, and general public services.
